org.jnosql.diana.api.column

Interface ColumnFamilyManagerAsync

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public interface ColumnFamilyManagerAsync
extends AutoCloseable
    Interface used to interact with the persistence context to ColumnEntity The ColumnFamilyManager API is used to create and remove persistent ColumnEntity instances, to find entities by their primary key, and to query over entities. The main difference to ColumnFamilyManager is because all the operation works asynchronously.

      • save

        default void save(Iterable<ColumnEntity> entities,
                  Duration ttl)
           throws ExecuteAsyncQueryException,
                  UnsupportedOperationException
        Saves an entities asynchronously with time to live, by default it's just run for each saving using save(ColumnEntity, Duration), each NoSQL vendor might replace to a more appropriate one.
        Parameters:
        entities - entity to be saved
        ttl - time to live
        Throws:
        ExecuteAsyncQueryException - when there is a async error
        UnsupportedOperationException - when the database does not have support to save asynchronous
